entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Arviat
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 16.
